item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Afraid of cookies? Don’t like cookies? Use your browser to block them. I don’t store any private data by default. I do use 3rd party analytics software such as Google Analytics which is widely used on the internet. For more information on Google Analytics cookie policy, look it up online.
